name: Mount Frost
description: Mount Frost is known as the coldest place in Elathia. A lonely mountain just miles from the sea shore of Kandor, in an area that is otherwise flat farmland. Mount Frost is known as a roosting place for silver dragons, who can be regularly seen soaring overhead. The locals regularly leave offerings for the dragons at the foot of the mountain, and meanwhile the area for 50 miles around has become known as the safest place to farm in Kandor.
